Nomenclature

This page provides a set of nomenclature used throughout the framework.

  • command, a data point whose value can be changed via VisualCommander
  • control deck, the set of modules and systems as described in a setup file
  • model, DSim class providing outputs from integrated states
  • module, ControlDeck software module
  • system, the name of a group of modules
  • telemetry, a data point made visible as telemetry in VisualCommander
  • variable, a parameter from a CD or DSim that is made accessible to other applications
